snippet.title: The Last Sigil -  New Trailer
snippet.description:
The Last Sigil is a roguelite action RPG.
Create your guild, hire randomly generated characters with different traits, stats and skills, and enter the Sigils to vanquish an ancient evil.
Fight hordes of enemies in procedural generated dungeons, hunt for loot, collect pets, trade and gamble with merchants or craft your own items.
Distribute stat points and upgrade your guild to increase your power and reach the Last Sigil.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/632100/The_Last_Sigil/
https://www.facebook.com/thelastsigil/

Music
Caleb Faith
calebfaith.com
